extendedInfo.description: To SAVE people GAS by carpooling with friends and helping with shopping and pickups.To SAVE people TIME in their busy days by fostering friendly collaboration on trips around town for anything.To SAVE people MONEY by lettingfriends alert them REALTIME on local store DEALS.To OPEN up communication between LOCAL friends and family on outings.To CUT DOWN on GAS CONSUMPTION in the US.
